title: Three found shot dead in Khuzdar - Pakistan - DAWN.COM
content:
KHUDZAR: Three bullet-riddled bodies were found in a stream near M-8 motorway in Khuzdar on Saturday, police said.

Residents of Surgaz informed the local administration about the three bodies in the stream. Police rushed to the site after receiving information.

“We have taken bodies into custody and shifted those to district hospital in Khuzdar,” said Abdullah Plandri, SHO of Khuzdar city police station, adding the deceased were identified as Abdul Majeed, Mumtaz Ahmed and Abdul Rehman.

The bodies were handed over to the families after completing medico-legal formalities.

“The victims had received multiple bullet injuries,” police said.

Published in Dawn, July 27th, 2025
